episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0100_1: We were able to get Lisia back to her concert!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0200_1:
That concert was a huuuge hit! You did awesome,
Master Lear!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0400_1:
A king must be capable. Otherwise, why would
anyone follow him?
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0500_1:
In order to make Pasio even better than it is now,
I have to be stronger and smarter than
everyone else!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0600_1:
This incident was the perfect chance to show
everyone my potential as king.
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0700_1:
You two also did a good job. But don’t you dare
get complacent!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0800_1:
You’ll stay by my side and fight along with me so
I can become the strongest king in existence!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_0900_1:
Of course, young master! I’ll follow you to the
ends of the world!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_1000_1: I totes got your back, too, Master Lear!
episode_event_boss_solo/6901_1001_1100_1: I wouldn’t settle for anything less!
